items.title: Tested: Nomad Find My Tracking Card Pro – metal build and 16-month battery life, but a touch thicker
items.summary:
I love me some Find My, and perhaps the most useful implementation of it in my life has come by way of those wonderful wallet tracker cards. Nomad’s Tracking Card (now known as the Tracking Card Air) has been a staple in my everyday carry for years and something I never leave the house without. However, the brand debuted a new Pro model this year with a metal build and much longer battery life and I have now had a chance to put this thing to the test, so let’s take a look to see if it is worth the higher price tag?

more…

items.title: Chronology of the 1MDB case involving Najib
items.summary: KUALA LUMPUR: After a seven-year trial, the High Court on Friday (Dec 26) sentenced Datuk Seri Najib Razak to 15 years in prison and a fine of RM11.4bil, in default 40 years' imprisonment, after he was found guilty of 25 charges of money laundering and abuse of power, involving RM2.3bil of 1Malaysia Development Berhad (1MDB) funds. Read full story

items.title: Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 $59, Hades II, Hollow Knight Silksong, more
items.summary:
You’ll find the three major digital console game sales waiting down below, alongside a host of mobile titles on sale for the holidays below. But we wanted to touch down this morning to highlight Woot’s deal on the new Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 for Switch. This regularly $70 bundle is relatively rarely on sale outside of these Woot offers and it has now dropped a touch lower at $58.99 Prime shipped. This is the proper U.S. boxed edition at the lowest price we can find – it is currently down at $59.49 shipped via a third-party Walmart if you would prefer to take that route. There is only a Switch version, but there is also a FREE Switch 2 update you can download that “leverages the Nintendo Switch 2’s processing capabilities for an even better adventure.”

items.title: A US judge temporarily blocks the Trump administration from detaining CCDH CEO Imran Ahmed, one of the Europeans the US barred on claims of promoting censorship (Aishvarya Kavi/New York Times)
items.summary:
Aishvarya Kavi / New York Times:
A US judge temporarily blocks the Trump administration from detaining CCDH CEO Imran Ahmed, one of the Europeans the US barred on claims of promoting censorship  —  Imran Ahmed, who runs an organization that chronicles disinformation, was among five Europeans the State Department had barred, claiming they promote censorship.

items.title: Sony’s amazing new XM6 ANC wireless headphones at $112 off for Christmas Day
items.summary:
Update 12/25: B&H is offering this same deal again for Christmas Day – the final $348 price will appear in the cart during checkout – this time it is available at both the black and platinum silver sets.

Heads up folks, we are now tracking a particularly notable deal on the wonderful new Sony WH-1000XM6 ANC headphones courtesy of B&H. One of the more exciting releases in flagship headphones this year and an extremely popular option among both readers and 9to5 staffers, you’ll now find the regularly $450 headphones dropping down to $348 shipped at B&H for today only – discount applies in the cart.

items.title: Thousands of downloadable games on sale for Christmas Day: Switch, PS5, Xbox, iPhone, Android, freebies, more
items.summary:
Merry Christmas folks! If you’re looking to score some new games you can download and play today, there are some great deals live on the eShop, PlayStation Store, App Store, and elsewhere. Just about all retail locations are, naturally, closed today and you’re almost certainly not going to be getting any traditional deliveries, but if you’re looking for some new titles to play while traveling or during some down time today to relax in between the festivities, there are plenty of deals live on downloadable titles.

items.summary:
The Best Buy Christmas Deals of the Day are now live. Today’s deals are headlined by AirPods Pro 3 down at $199.50 (Update: Now also available at Amazon) alongside an Apple gift card offers that include FREE Best Buy credit, but you’ll also find up to $500 robotic vacuums, smart locks, smart TVs, gaming gear, and more.

items.title: What stores are closed for Christmas Day 2025? Walmart, Best Buy, Target, Costco, more
items.summary:
Is Walmart closed for Christmas Day? Is Best Buy and Target open today? How about Costco and Sam’s Club? The short answer here is yes, it’s Christmas and just about everything will be closed today. You might find the odd Dunkin’ or McDonald’s open, and it looks like all Waffle House locations are open today, but by and large it’s a day of celebration, gifts, and relaxation.

items.title: Commute on a budget with GoTrax’s Xr Elite e-scooter at its second-best $269 rate (Reg. $380)
items.summary:
Amazon is offering the GoTrax Xr Elite Electric Scooter at $269 shipped. It’s coming down from its full $380 rate here, with discounts having mostly kept things above $306 over the year, though there were falls lower to $280 and the $262 low. Today’s deal comes in as a 29% markdown that cuts $111 from the tag, giving you a shot at the second-lowest price that lands just $7 above that one-time low we last saw in August.
